description:
If you enjoy Wikipedia, then this is the app for you. . qWiki is a WebOS App for performing quick Wikipedia searches and uses Wikipedia's spellchecker as you enter your search string. 

NOTES: 
- Language translation might not be 100%. If you have a better translation, feel free to let me know and I will include it in the next release.
- Live Search/Spellcheck (LSS) requires a high bandwidth connection.

Version 1.0
- All features of the trial version are included in this release
- Additional features include: 
1) Click on the home icon to load the wikipedia home page (mobile version
2) Click on the dice icon to load a random wikipedia article
3) Click on the target icon to make use of location services to retrieve wikipedia related information of your current location
- Use the preferences screen to:
1) set your language
2) choose between a light/dark color scheme
3) enable live search/spellcheck
4) enable location services (will load location specific wikipedia information at each launch)
5) select a radius (from current location) to use for location services
6) select the number of rows to return when using location services
